DBD!

Я начал играть в августе 2020, когда в игре был баг с холмом: у него можно было застрять до конца матча. С тех пор в этой игре меня ничего не удивляет. Вы можете себе представить, чтобы в какой нибудь кс человек застревал в определенном месте в текстурах до конца раунда? Кто-то ответит "ну ведь кс соревновательная игра, а дбд -- хоррор", а вот нет, никакой дбд не хоррор, здесь испугаться можно только 1 раз, когда вас первый раз за жопу схватит майкл на 1 фазе. Дальше вы будете просто фаниться с друзьями с веселыми перками, токсичить и угарать, ну и играть на победу разумеется. Здесь почти все играют на победу. Играют в паблике, играют турниры. Никакой это не хоррор, это тоже киберспорт. Так вот, возвращаясь к вопросу, нормально ли для киберспортивной игры иметь подобные проблемы? Я видел столько багов, что их записи занимают более 30!!! гб у меня на диске. 
И все же, у этой игры нет аналогов. Если вы хотите в нее поиграть -- поиграйте, но если она вас затянет и будет для вас уже не хоррором, а чистым киберспортом, то вы пожалеете.
OBSESSED!!!

[b] [u] [Full Disclosure: I was prompted to write this review by the recent #DeadByBoycott] [/u] [/b]

DBD is a game that I've played on and off since Beta. I've played a ton of both PC and PS4. Before I continue, I've got to say I love this game. I stream it regularly, I've met most of my good friends through it. It holds a very special place in my heart but having said all this I could not recommend this game to anyone.

The 2 biggest issues in my opinion are the "The Grind" & "Game Health".

[u] The Grind [/u]
To put it simply, you will have to spend obscene amounts to get anywhere close to a workable builds for the characters you wanna play. The game has just continued to bloat and bloat to a point where new players are faced with a brick wall. To give you a little idea, I've spent 1000 hours on the PC game, I mainly play killer and in that time, I have 2 killers P3 with builds that enjoy.

I know no other game where you can spend such a huge amount of time and feel like you've accomplished so little.

[u] Game Health [/u]
While, your spending your time making awfully slow progress towards your preferred character, you will be dealing with a very unhealthy game. If anyone is familiar with Destiny and how long it takes Bungie to roll out fixes - if you found this terrible, you will hate this Game. BHVR near every patch break more things and it is never a quick turnaround.

They've released killers broken and fixed them nearly a year later. Audio & Visual bugs are common place and to say where 5 years in it doesn't feel like things are getting better. 

This is simply my view and opinion and should not be taken as fact but BHVR have a "Work when you wanna work" policy and I cant help but think this is why everything feels so lazy. 

[b] [u] In Closing [/u] [/b]
I love this game and I would love for you to love it too but you won't. You'll work for hours to get anywhere in this game where it feels like its falling to pieces.

I'll update my review if these things change, until then. - pray for me.

Weirdest romance simulator game out here. You have choice to play for main character of the game (and you also can choose between main characters, each has their own unique route) or to play for his love option (if you're picking this one you cannot pick who's route you're gonna play, you're just side character anyway).
As main character, your goal is to pick one of the romance options on start of the route and chase after her or him, hoping that once you'll catch up, they'll be ready too hook up with you. You also might spend all the weeks of the route trying to get to one and only chosen one, but never achieve the ending (sometimes they tend to be way too hard to get).
Let's talk a bit about some of the characters.
♥ Trapper: loneliest main character around here. He was not getting any dates that much, that after weeks of not getting romantic dinner by candlelight he lost a lot of weight.
♥ Twins: you get to romance beautiful Charlotte (who's also great at cooking!). Minuses of the relationship with her? At one point she will ask you to watch after Victor, but you'll never will be able to catch him and she might be very sad to hear afterwards that you've lost such an adorable child somewhere in the forest.
♥ Ghostface: it's easy to fall on his bad side. He likes to get to know you before actually approaching and the fact that you never notice his stares does annoy him enough for it to build, which does cause great disappointment in you. He might give you around 3 tries or so to prove him that you do deserve some attention, but after failing to do so, he will move on to someone more interesting. 
♥ Nurse: sweetest person around here, very concerned over your health, does not approve self-medication. Before taking any medications, over-the-counter drugs, supplements or herbs, consult a physician for a thorough evaluation.
♥ Deathslinger: cowboy macho with bad temper, might trick you into thinking that you're his love interest, while actually going for someone else.
♥ Trickster: typical default main character of visual novel. Has some interesting voicelines, but prefers to introduce you to his umbrella other than gifting even a single kunai.

ღ Dwight Fairfield: if you're about to pick your love interest, watch out! Dwights are not as cute and not as harmless as they might look. You can also achieve dark Dwight ending where he will suck you into the locker and close you in it forever.

For some unknown reason a lot of people that play as romance interest seem to hate phase when main character asks you to hook up in private zone and in devotion does spend all of his time staring in your eyes. People supposed to be flattered, yet they aren't. Most likely because of lack of the content that is available to you during date.
After 5 years of beta-testing of the game they still haven't added hug emotion to show to main character all the love he deserves.

Sinceramente, o jogo já foi muito bom um dia. Porém, sem quaisquer competitividade no mercado de jogos, fez com que a equipe do jogo, não desse muita atenção a comunidade ou muito menos se dedicasse em realizar atualizações de conteúdo, que sejam significativas ao jogo. As últimas três DLCs adicionadas, ofereceram apenas uma vasta quantidade de bugs o que veio desencantado os jogadores com maior frequência. Infelizmente, hoje, jogo apenas por ter gasto uma quantia significativa com o jogo e por ter amigos que ainda jogam DbD.
Infelizmente, os Devs do jogo, não devem jogar o jogo. Pois, algumas das suas declarações, afirmam, que "campar" ("guardar-caixão"), é uma estratégia saudável para o jogo. Se os mesmo jogasse o jogo, afirmaria com total certeza, que esse comportamento é tóxico e totalmente frutante, sendo esse um dos maiores episódios durante uma partida.
Claro, sem falar dos grandes bugs, que nunca se dedicam a corrigir. Um clássico, é o Duro na Queda, uma perk que sempre te causará grandes frustrações e exaustão no chão. Um problema clássico nos servidores do jogo. O jogo tem grande potencial, porém, não com a mesma equipe que hoje a Behaviour  conduz. Concluindo, não recomendo esse jogo para novos jogadores, apenas se empresa encarregada, dedique-se para ouvir a comunidade e corrigir e se eu pudesse solicitar o valor total gasto com esse jogo, faria sem hesitação.

Oyun gerçekten zevkli ve eğelenceli. Eğer arkadaşlarla oynamak için bir oyun arıyorsanız ve korku teması seviyorsanız gerçekten güzel. Ancak oyunda çok rahatsız edici buglar mevcut ve update geldikçe daha da kötüye gidiyor gibi gözüküyor. Parti kurmak ve arkadaşlarını davet etmek işkenceye dönüşüyor. Olmadık anda partiden atıyor. Bunun dışında pek optimize edilmiş grafiklere de sahip değil. Çok daha realistik görünümlü oyunlar aynı sistemimde daha iyi performans veriyor. Buglar düzeltilirse oynamanızı öneririm.
